com1.text: Once at the top, well, you already know how great the views are, especially on clear days, and the Bay Breeze is always on point!!

com2.text: When in SF, you just come here for to have a good panoramic view of the city. Easy drive and there are plenty of parking.

com3.text: It was before the pandemic but this was one of the most beautiful spots to visit in San Francisco.

com5.text: Best way to see ALL of San Francisco.

com6.text: Never gets tired, love being by the water.

com8.text: Once at the top, well, you already know how great the views are, especially on clear days, and the Bay Breeze is always on point!!

com9.text: When in SF, you just come here for to have a good panoramic view of the city. Easy drive and there are plenty of parking.

com12.text: Best way to see ALL of San Francisco.

com13.text: Never gets tired, love being by the water.

com14.text: Peaceful and relaxing. On a cool afternoon or evening in summer, it may be all fog. On a wintry day, rain. But for so many days of the year, it's a clear view all the way to San Francisco, Oakland, Marin County, sighting through the Golden Gate Bridge to the Pacific Ocean, beyond.

com15.text: Once at the top, well, you already know how great the views are, especially on clear days, and the Bay Breeze is always on point!!

com16.text: When in SF, you just come here for to have a good panoramic view of the city. Easy drive and there are plenty of parking.

com17.text: It was before the pandemic but this was one of the most beautiful spots to visit in San Francisco.

com19.text: Best way to see ALL of San Francisco. On a cool afternoon or evening in summer, it may be all fog. On a wintry day, rain. But for so many days of the year, it's a clear view.

com20.text: Great spot to see the expanse of city. Its kind of crazy and serene to be up there, looking over so many people and so many things. Awesome view of the bay! Never gets tired, love being by the water.

com22.text: Once at the top, well, you already know how great the views are, especially on clear days, and the Bay Breeze is always on point!!

com23.text: When in SF, you just come here for to have a good panoramic view of the city. Easy drive and there are plenty of parking.

com24.text: Staying in San Francisco for business, and had a free afternoon. Decided to drive up and get the view! Totally worth the while. I suggest packing a picnic! It was before the pandemic but this was one of the most beautiful spots to visit in San Francisco.

com27.text: Never gets tired, love being by the water.

com30.text: We come here often, never gets tired, love being by the water.

com31.text: Staying in San Francisco for business, and had a free afternoon. Decided to drive up and get the view! Totally worth the while. I suggest packing a picnic! Peaceful and relaxing.

com33.text: Never gets tired, love being by the water.  Great winding road with amazing views all over and with several turnoffs to stop and take pictures

com34.text: Great winding road with amazing views all over and with several turnoffs to stop and take pictures.  Peaceful and relaxing.
